name: Cowboy Runner (Sullivan Coding Classes)
description:
A wild west themed endless runner with a score that continues until you run out of lives. You have 3 lives to use once you run out it’s your run ends. The score continuously rises the longer you dodge the obstacles that are thrown in your path. Also the farther you get the game speeds up and gets progressively more difficult. Try to beat your previous run or your best run. Enjoy.

Note: This game was develop by the AP Computer Science Principles class at Sullivan North High School. The game was developed in 2.5 days. We plan on continuing to develop the app over the next week.
